main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Pittsfield, Maine, involving an unidentified object observed for 4 minutes.
interesting points: The observation was a ground visual,The object was described as circular and saucer-shaped,The object emitted a steadily flashing, brilliant light,There was a loud whirring sound associated with the sighting,Movement of stones was noted on the ground beneath the object's path.
witness description: reliable report, no specific witnesses mentioned
